Si algo ha aprendido es que la muerte es uno de los actos más importantes de la vida y que mantener la dignidad y el respeto por el ser humano en la última etapa de la existencia constituye hoy una responsabilidad a la que la enfermera debe hacer frente, sobre todo en la que se reflejarán las creencias más profundas acerca del significado de la profesión.
Ponerse el uniforme con la mejor sonrisa será un solo paso, ella  lo considera parte de la vestimenta, si el trabajo es un servicio a personas que se encuentran en una situación de dolor, el primer calmante que puedo darles será un intento de transmitir alegría y esperanza, una inyección de optimismo. 
Ante un enfermo terminal, la enfermera es  consciente de la alta calidad profesional de los cuidados, se esforzará por prestarle hasta el final de la vida, con competencia y compasión, los cuidados necesarios para aliviar los sufrimientos. También proporcionará a la familia la ayuda necesaria para que puedan afrontar la muerte, cuando ésta ya no pueda evitarse.
Ya terminando espera dejar claro la  vocación por la carrera y que ser enfermera no es solo estar al lado de un paciente si no brindar seguridad, respeto, confianza, amor y  felicidad.
El beneficio de kiva seria de gran ayuda ya que ella hasta hora esta empezando la carrera de enfermería y los gastos se incrementaran un poco mas adelante, mas los gastos que tiene en el hogar es mas difícil pagar el valor normal de las  cuotas.
texts.en:
This is Erika Paola. At the age of 15, she had no direction as to where she wanted to go in the future. Among the high school classes she took, there wasn’t one that she particularly liked. Erika doesn’t remember exactly the person she spoke with who recently graduated from the nursing program. She only remembers being convinced about taking that career path and how much could be accomplished without leaving a patient’s room. When she came home, Erika told her mother that she wanted to study to become a nurse.

If anything, Erika has learned that death is one of the most important parts of life and that having dignity and respect for another human being who is in the final stage of existence is a responsibility that a nurse has to confront. Most of all, the nurse must reflect on the deeper beliefs that one has about the meaning of the profession.

Wearing the uniform with the best smile is one part of the dress code that Erika considers to be important. Part of the job is to help people who are in painful situations. The primary remedy that one can give is to convey joy and hope, with an injection of optimism.

When working with the terminally ill, the nurse is conscious about the high quality of professional care. The individual nurse must strive to provide that level of care until the end of life, with competence and compassion, since it is necessary to relieve suffering. The nurse must also provide the necessary assistance to the family when confronting death since it can’t be avoided.

Upon finishing the program, the graduate should have clarity with regard to the chosen career path. Being a nurse not only means working with patients, but providing them security, respect, trust, love, and happiness.

Having the benefit of Kiva will be a great help to Erika as she starts her nursing degree. Her expenses will increase slightly in the future, but for now, keeping up with her household expenses will be more difficult than paying the normal tuition cost.

loans.use: to pay for a semester of tuition.

loans.name: Martha

texts.en:
Meet Marta, a well-established farmer, in the Chuka area of Eastern Kenya. She is married and has four school-aged children. She has a 1/2-acre of land, which produces vegetables, coffee, bananas, milk, and eggs. These are her main source of income. Her biggest challenges are marketing and shortage of rain.

Martha chose Juhudi Kilimo because they help small-scale farmers to grow economically, by giving them loans for their projects. During the training, she learned that mfis do help low income earners to access funds, to uplift their living standards. After she gets the farm inputs, her output will increase, and hence, she will earn more income. This will improve their living standards

loans.use: to purchase farm inputs.

loans.name: Inobat

texts.en: Inobat was born in 1971. She is a smart and hardworking woman. Inobat is a careful mother of four children. All of them are non-adults. Inobat began a business with animal husbandry 15 years ago. Her children, year by year, demand more money. Her income is small and is not enough to provide her children with all the necessary things. Inobat is going to start new business with sewing. She can sew national women’s dresses. Inobat took part in a course, “To get Ahead,” from a women’s organization with this aim. She is asking for a loan of 1,000 TJS to buy a sewing machine for organizing a new business. She awaits your support.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine for organizing a new business.

loans.name: Melanie

texts.en: Melanie is 37 years old, and married with two children, both of whom are in school. Melanie works very hard to provide for them. She runs a general store in the Philippines, and requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase more groceries to sell. Melanie has been in this business for ten years, and sells a variety of items such as soap, shampoo, and other groceries.  In the future, Melanie would like to save money to expand her business, and continue to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Liezyl

texts.en: Liezyl is a young woman and a mother of three, who operates a general store for a living. For more than four years, she has earned well, and has successfully repaid her previous loan used for the business. With her generated revenue, she was able to buy a pedi cab to use for a transportation services business. She is happy with her business now, because it helps her family a lot. Recently, she took a new loan, to buy tires and leather for repairs. She wants to provide a better education for her children, and to live comfortably in their own house.

loans.use: to buy tires and leather for repairs.

loans.name: Sinia Sonia

texts.es:
Sinia, es viuda, sus hijos ya son independientes, actualmente vive con una nieta, se dedica a vender pescado desde hace 20 años, es una iniciativa propia que nace por la necesidad de tener los recursos económicos para cubrir los gastos familiares. Su horario de trabajo es de 7:00 a.m. a 2:30 p.m. por el momento no representa ningún riesgo.
Utilizará el crédito para comprar un freezer y variedad de pescado, tendrá en mejores condiciones su producto para que mantenga su frescura y calidad, así sus clientes se sentirán satisfechos, sus ventas aumentaran y tendrá mejores ganancias.
La Sra.: Sinia sueña con tener un local propio para ofrecer otro tipo de productos, mejorar su economía para hacer modificaciones en su vivienda.
texts.en:
Sinia is a widow. Her children on on their own. Right now, she lives with a granddaughter. She has sold fish for 20 years. She started doing this on her own initiative out of a need to have financial resources to cover the household expenses. Her work schedule is from 7:00 a.m. to 2:30 p.m. and right now she has nor problems with it.

She will use the loan to buy a freezer and a variety of fish. She will have better conditions for her products so she can maintain its freshness and quality. This way, her customers will be satisfied, her sales will increase and she will have better profits. Sinia dreams of having her own locale to offer her type of products and improve her finances so that she can make some modifications on her home.

loans.use: to buy a freezer and a variety of fish.

loans.name: Aleyda Maryinee

texts.es: Doña Aleyda, es comerciante de ropa, calzado y cosméticos y su compañero de vida se dedica al  taxeo diario, es madre de tres hijos dos de ellos universitarios, doña Aleyda pone  todo su empeño en su labor para mantener los gastos de sus hijos. Solicita el crédito para invertir en el negocio con productos atractivos para sus clientes, comprara una paca de chores, playeras relacionados a la temporada de verano y cosméticos, así mejorar las ventas e ir progresando junto a su familia.
texts.en: Aleyda sells clothes, shoes and cosmetics and her life's companion drives a taxi during the day. She is the mother of three children and two of them are in college. Puts all of her effort into paying for her children's expenses. She is asking for the loan to invest in her business with products that are attractive to her customers. She will buy a pack of shorts and t-shirts for the summer season, as well as cosmetics. This way, she will improve her sales and progress with her family.

loans.use: to buy a pack of clothing and cosmetics.

loans.name: Jannat

texts.ru: Жаннат 34 года, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 5 детей. У Жаннат - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Жаннат занимается животноводством, стартовав 16 лет назад, с покупки скота на 20,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Жаннат, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 6 дойных коров, 3 теленка, 10 овец. Ежемесячный доход составляет 10,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Жаннат обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом - на покупку овец для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Жаннат планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на строительство нового дома.
texts.en:
Jannat is 34 years old, and married with five children. She has a high school education and raises livestock to support her family. She started her business 16 years ago by buying cattle for 20,000KGS. 

Due to her hard work she now has six dairy cows, three calves, and ten sheep.  Her monthly income is 10,000 KGS. She has applied for a loan from micro-finance bank, Bai-Tushum, to buy more sheep. With the extra income she plans to invest in further increasing her domestic herd and save to build a new house.

loans.use: to buy sheep.

loans.name: Martha Alicia

texts.es:
Martha tiene 27 años de edad, es madre soltera, pero a pesar de eso ella es una mujer muy luchadora, solo estudió hasta octavo grado, pero siempre ha buscado la forma de salir adelante, para sacar adelante a su hija ya que no tiene ayuda del padre.


Martha siempre se ha dedicado a los oficios domésticos, y en sus tiempos libres hace trabajos de agricultura, ella tiene que movilizarse a la ciudad para poder trabajar, aunque el empleo es cansado ella sabe que es la única forma de salir adelante, por lo que se levanta muy temprano para salir a trabajar.


Ella solicita este préstamo a CrediCampo, para mejorar su vivienda pues quiere construir un muro abajo de su casa  para que así no pueda deteriorarse el suelo, ni peligre su vivienda, por lo que necesita apoyo económico, ya que por el momento no cuenta con los ingresos suficientes para realizarlo.


Martha sueña con tener una vivienda con menos riesgos, en la que su hijo pueda estar seguro, sin peligro que pueda caerse por el deslave que se ha ocasionado, por lo que ella quiere hacer el pequeño muro antes de que inicie la época lluviosa.
texts.en:
Martha is 27 years old. She is a single mother who despite being a fighter, only went to school up to the eighth grade. However, she has always looked for a way to get ahead and to get her daughter ahead, since she doesn't have her father's help. 

Martha has always worked doing housework. In her free time, she does farm work. She has to go to the city to be able to work. Even though her work is tiring, she knows that it is the only way to get ahead, so she gets up very early to go to work. 

She is asking for this loan from CrediCampo to do home improvement. She wants to do some home improvement by building a wall below her house so that the ground doesn't deteriorate and endanger her home. To do this she needs financial help because she doesn't have enough income to do it at this time. 

Martha dreams of having a home with less problems here her daughter can be safe with no danger of it falling down due to a landslide that has occurred. That is why she wants the little wall before the rainy season begins.

loans.use: to do home improvements. She wants to build a wall below her house.

loans.name: Azim

texts.ru:
Азим добродушный и жизнерадостный парень в возрасте 29 лет. Он женат, и очень счастлив иметь двоих детей.  Он очень любит свою жену и детей и всю свою душу он вкладывает в семью. Азим живёт со своей женой в небольшом доме в сельском посёлке. Жена Азима домохозяйка, находясь дома, выполняет всю домашнюю работу и ухаживает за детьми.

Чтобы прокормить свою семью Азим занимается своим бизнесом. Он занимается деканством и животноводством. У него имеется земельная площадь. Из общей площади земли, некоторая часть земли составляет богарные земли, а остальная площадь это поливные земли. На этой земле Азим занимается выращиванием моркови, картошки и зерновых культур. А его жена помогает ему ухаживать и растить скот. Так как земельная площадь у них большая, они также пасут на ней своих скот. Бизнес животноводства приносит хороший доход, поэтому Азим хочет расширить этот бизнес, увеличив поголовье своего скота. Для этого он обратился в Арванд, чтобы получить кредит на покупку скота. Аличон заранее благодарит Арванд за финансовую поддержку.
texts.en:
Azim is a good-hearted and resilient 29-year-old man. He is married and very happy to have two children. He loves his family very much and pours his whole soul into his wife and kids. 

He and his wife live in a small house in a rural village. Azim's wife takes care of the home, does all the housework and looks after the children. To support his family Azim raises cattle. He has a plot of land, part of which is irrigated. He grows carrots, potatoes and grains. His wife helps him to look after the cattle. Since the plot of land is big, they also graze their cattle on it. Their livestock earns them a good income, so Azim wants to expand it by increasing the size of the herd.  

Azim has applied for a loan from Arvand to buy cattle, and thanks them in advance for their financial support.

loans.use: to purchase livestock.

loans.name: Maksuda

texts.en: Maksuda is 47 years old. She is married and has three children. Her husband is a farmer. They try to provide their children with all the necessary things but her husband’s income is small. Maksuda decided to organize a new bakery business. She is going to cook biscuits and sell them in a local market. She took part in a course, ‘To get Ahead’ - part of a women’s organization - and she got a lot of new and useful information for herself. She is asking for a loan of 1,500 Somoni (TJS) to buy an oven for organizing her new business. She awaits your support.

loans.use: To buy an oven for organizing her new business

loans.name: Jose Leodan

texts.es:
José, vive con su familia, integrada por su esposa y sus hijos, tiene la responsabilidad de cubrir los gastos familiares, se dedica al cultivo de granos básicos y  pipián, es un oficio que aprendió de su familia y lo realiza desde hace diez años, su horario es de 6:00 a.m. a 4.00 p.m.
Invertirá en la compra de plaguicidas, pesticidas, abono y pago de riego del cultivo de pipián, para sacar una buena producción y evitar que sea afectada por alguna plaga, espera que sus ingresos mejoren para cancelar con buen record crediticio su deuda.
Sueña con reunir los recursos económicos necesarios para comprar un vehículo, con el cual trasladar la producción al mercado de su localidad.
texts.en:
José lives with his family, which includes his wife and children. He is responsible for covering his family’s expenses. José grows basic grains and pipián gourds. He learned this trade from his family and has been farming for the past 10 years. His schedule is from 6:00 A.M. to 4:00 P.M.

José will invest in the purchase of fungicides, pesticides, and compost, as well as the cost of irrigating his crop of pipián gourds. This will enable him to have a good production and avoid pest infestation. He hopes that his earnings will improve so that he can pay off this debt and have a good credit record.

José dreams of having the necessary financial resources to buy a vehicle. This would enable him to transport his crops to the market in town.

loans.use: to buy fungicides, pesticides, and compost, as well as pay the cost of irrigation.

loans.name: Luis Antonio

texts.es:
Luis, necesita capital para comprar una pulidora, discos, electrodos, laminas y hierro, son materiales que le ayudaran a cumplir con su trabajo y satisfacer las demandas de sus clientes.
El crédito anterior le permitió comprar materia prima para su taller de estructuras metálicas, aumento el número de clientes, sus ganancias son mejores, cancelo sus deudas, su familia se encuentra muy saludable y viviendo con un mejor estilo de vida.
texts.en:
Luis needs capital to buy a polisher, discs, electrodes, laminate and iron. They are the materials that help him do his work and meet his customer's demands.

The previous loan enabled him to buy raw materials for his metal structure fabrication workshop, increase his number of customers, his earnings have grown, he paid his debts, his family is very healthy and living a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a polisher, discs, electrodes, laminate and iron.

loans.name: Rosella

texts.en:
Rosella is 30 years old and married with one child.

Rosella works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 23,000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase more groceries like bread, sardines, soft drinks and other items.

Rosella has borrowed and repaid six loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for eight years and also earns an income from a loading and selling frozen foods businesses.

Rosella aspires to save money to expand her business and repair her family's home.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries like bread, sardines, soft-drinks and other items.

loans.name: Sonunbu

texts.ru: Сонунбу 62 года, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 4 детей. У Сонунбу - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Сонунбу занимается животноводством, стартовав 14 лет назад, с покупки скота на 6,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Сонунбу, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 4 дойные коровы, 2 лошади, 18 овец. Ежемесячный доход составляет 10,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Сонунбу обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом - на покупку коров для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Сонунбу планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на покупку нового холодильника.
texts.en:
Sonunbu is 62 years old, and married with four children. She has a high school education and raises livestock as the family's main income. She started this business 14 years ago by buying cattle for 6,000KGS.

Due to her hard work, she now has four dairy cows, two horses and 18 sheep. Her monthly income is 10,000 KGS. She has applied for a loan from micro-finance bank, Bai-Tushum, to buy cattle for breeding. She plans to use the income from the loan to invest in increasing her domestic herd and to save to buy a new refrigerator.

loans.use: to buy cows.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to raise more chickens

loans.name: Ainura

texts.ru: Айнуре 30 лет, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают сына. У Айнуры- среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Айнура занимается полеводством и животноводством, стартовав 10 лет назад, с 15,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Айнуры, на сегодняшний день имеется: 2 дойные коровы, 5 овец, 2 теленка, также имеется парник, в котором ежегодно выращивает перец, огурцы, помидоры для внутрихозяйственного потребления и реализации. Ежемесячный совокупныЙ доход составляет 10,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Айнура обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом для закупа высококачественных семян перца, огурцов, помидоров для посевных работ и удобрений для обработки земли. Айнура намерена получить хороший урожай, что непременно приведет к увеличению капитала семьи. Доходы от кредита Айнура планирует вложить в приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на покупку мебели.
texts.en:
Ainura is a 30-year-old married woman with a son. She has a high school education. Ten years ago she started farming and raising cattle with 15,000 KGS to support her family. 

Due to her hard work, she now has two dairy cows, five sheep and two calves, and a plot of land on which she annually grows peppers, cucumbers and tomatoes for their own use as well as to sell. Her total monthly income is 10,000KGS. To grow her income Ainura has applied for a loan from micro-finance bank, Bai-Tushum, to buy high-quality pepper, cucumber and tomato seeds to sow, as well as fertilizer. 

Ainura will get a good harvest, which will increase her family's capital. She plans to use the extra income to increase her domestic herd and save enough money to buy furniture.

loans.use: to buy seeds for cucumbers, tomatoes and peppers, as well as fertilizer.

loans.name: Rita

texts.en:
Rita is a married woman and a mother of five children from Antequera, Bohol. She has been engaged in a basket weaving business for more than 20 years now. This is the source of her income.

Rita is asking for a loan to buy bamboo and straw for basket weaving, and to buy cement, wood and nails for the repair of her house. She needs to repair her house because it was ruined by the earthquake.

In the future, Rita hopes of making her business a success.

loans.use: to buy bamboo and straw for basket weaving, and to buy cement, wood and nails for the repair of her house

loans.name: Ekaterine

texts.en:
Ekaterine, who is a 35-year-old married woman, lives in Zugdidi District. She has three children, a husband and mother-in-law. The family belongs to a subsistence poor category, as they have no significant income for existence, except monthly assistance from local government. 

Ekaterine can't satisfy her children's increased needs and has a great desire to start her own activity. Particularly, with the requested money she will purchase clothing at wholesale prices from the capital of Georgia, where the biggest market is located and then will sell them locally for an increased price. 

Ekaterine’s request was approved through the joint initiative between Kiva and Credo, that enables poor people to start or re-start businesses. This loan will be huge help to this hard-working woman, as she will gain some income for her children's welfare. Ekaterine relies on the good will of lenders and will highly appreciate the assistance.

loans.use: To purchase clothing to resell

loans.name: Luisa

texts.es:
Luisa vive en la ciudad de Huayopata que está ubicado en la provincia de La Convención del departamento del Cusco. Su actividad económica principal de la socia es la venta de productos de primera necesidad como por ejemplo arroz, azúcar, fideos, gaseosas, refrescos, agua mineral y otras cosas. Ella es una persona responsable y amable que pertenece al banco comunal "Buena Vista" de la Asociación Arariwa desde hace varios años. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar sacos de azúcar y sacos de arroz. 

Luisa agrace a los inversionistas por el préstamo y se compromete a pagar las cuotas con mucha responsabilidad.
texts.en:
Luisa lives in the city of Huayopata, which is located in the province of La Convencion in the department of Cusco.  Her main economic activity is the sale of necessity items, including rice, sugar, soda, drinks, and mineral water.  She is a responsible and kind person who has been a member of the Buena Vista community bank for many years.

She is requesting this loan to purchase sacks of sugar and rice.  

Luisa is grateful to the lenders for this loan and promises to make her repayments responsibly.

loans.use: to purchase sacks of sugar and rice.

loans.name: Angela Emelina

texts.es:
Ángela de 61 años de edad, madre soltera con un hijo menor de edad, el cual estudia en la universidad. Es originaria del Sauce lugar que está ubicada en la zona norte de la región. Se caracteriza por ser trabajadora, responsable, con ganas de superación personal. En sus ratos libre le gusta disfrutar de la compañía de su  familia. En la actualidad lucha día a día para bríndale un futuro mejor a sus hijos. 
Gracias a su esfuerzo y sus ganas de salir adelante tiene por actividad económica el servicio de sastrería la confección de  prenda de vestir como blusas, faldas, pantalones, short, jugos de cama, capri. Ella dedica a su negocio unas ocho horas diarias ofreciendo su producto. El objetivo del crédito es invertir en capital de trabajo y surtir su negocio en la compra y venta de productos de costura como retazos de telas, codinas, agujas, carretes, encajes, forros, cintas, bobinas, aceite de máquina, botones, para que en un futuro no muy lejano pueda obtener mejores ingresos. Ángela agradece la ayuda que los inversionistas kiva le brindan a personas de escasos recursos y países pobre como es Nicaragua para tener un medio de trabajo digno.
texts.en:
Ángela is a 61 year-old single mother with one child who is studying at the university. She is originally from Sauce, a place located in the northern zone of the region. She is characterized as a responsible, hardworking woman with ambitions to improve herself. In her free moments, she likes to enjoy the company of her family. In the present moment, she fights day by day to provide a better future for her children.

Thanks to her effort and her ambitions to move forward, she offers her services as a tailor in the creation of clothing separates like blouses, skirts, pants, shorts, bedding sets, and capri pants. She dedicates eight hours every day to working at her business. The objective of this loan is to invest in working capital and to stock her business with the purchase of sewing products like small pieces of fabric, wire netting, needles, spools, lace, lining, ribbon, bobbins, machine oil, and buttons. This way, in the near future she can obtain better earnings.

Ángela is grateful for the help that Kiva lenders offer to people with scarce resources and poor countries like Nicaragua in order to have a means to decent work.

loans.use: for the purchase of primary materials and materials for garment-making: blouses, skirts, pants, shorts, bedding, and short pants.

loans.name: Zuhro

texts.ru: Ее зовут Зухро она уроженка маленького северного городка Худжанд. Ей 43 года. Зухро замужняя женщина, она с мужем воспитывает двоих детей. Зухро имеет маленький свадебный салон. Она дает напрокат свадебные наряды. Зухро умеет шить занавески, и она параллельно с салоном берет заказы на шитье занавесок. На данный момент она занимается обеими работами для покрытия растущих семейных расходов. Зухро решилась взять кредит и купить больше свадебных платьев на прокат и тканей для шитья занавесок. Она просит ей помочь.
texts.en:
Zyhro is a native of a small northern village called Khujand. She is a married 43-year-old mother of two. 

She has a small wedding salon. She rents out wedding dresses. She knows how to sew curtains, and takes orders at the salon to sew curtains. She is engaged in both types of work to meet the family's growing expenses. 

Zyhro decided to take a loan to buy more wedding dresses to rent out and fabric for curtains. She asks for your help.

loans.use: to buy wedding dresses and fabric.

loans.name: Tania Carolina

texts.es: La señora Tania Carolina es una joven muy interesada en la enfermería, ya que le llama mucho la atención y la  familia se sentirá muy orgullosa y  muy beneficiada, siempre quiso que apenas terminara el bachillerato entrara a estudiar, pero la familia no tiene muchos ingresos económicos así que decidió entrar a trabajar en una empresa haciendo billeteras, ella esta muy contenta con el trabajo a aprendido mucho y la tratan muy bien y con este trabajo ella le ayuda  a la familia , esta muy feliz porque entro a estudiar, pero lamentablemente  los ingresos económicos son escasos, ya que le pagan por horas, ella necesita el convenio kiva para no abandonar los estudios, para ser  una excelente enfermera en la policía, que es  otra de las grandes metas.
texts.en:
Tania Carolina is a young woman who is very interested in nursing, since it caught her attention and it will benefit her family and make them feel very proud.

She always wanted to begin studying as soon as she finished high school, but her family does not have much income so she decided to begin working in a business making wallets. She is very happy with the work. She has learned a lot, they treat her very well, and with this work she helps her family. 

She is very happy because she began studying, but unfortunately, income is scarce since they pay her per hour. She needs the Kiva loan in order to avoid abandoning her studies so she can become an excellent nurse for the police, another one of her biggest goals.

loans.use: to pay a semester of registration fees

loans.name: Shahodat

texts.en: Shahodat was born in 1967. She lives with her large family in a village, and she has 5 children. Shahodat’s husband is a farmer, and she always helps her husband with growing vegetables. Now, she wants to start her own sewing business.  Shahodat is going to serve as a sewer in her house. She is asking for a loan of 500 Somoni to buy a sewing machine for her new business. This loan will help her to organize business and to find a source of income. She awaits your support.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine for her new business.

loans.name: Luzmila

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “HUAYOPATA-CHONTA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Huayopata, perteneciente a la provincia de La Convención y departamento de Cusco.

La socia Luzmila se dedica al negocio de agricultura, la socia tiene un terreno donde cultiva café, cacao  y platanos, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 hasta las 5:00 p.m, la socia ya tiene varios años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender el cafe.La socia solicita el crédito para comprar semillas y fertilizantes.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Luzmila is a member of the Huayopata-Chonta community bank.  The bank is located in the Huayopata district in the province of La Convencion and department of Cusco.

Luzmila works as a farmer.  She has land where she grows coffee, cacao, and bananas. She works from 8:00am until 5:00pm.  She has done this work for many years and it is going well.  Her dream is to have a store where she can sell coffee.  

She is requesting this loan to purchase seeds and fertilizers.  She is happy with the loan and promises to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: to purchase seeds and fertilizers.

loans.name: Rosa Maria

texts.es:
Rosa María vive en la ciudad de Huayopata que está ubicado en la provincia de La Convención del departamento del Cusco. Su actividad económica principal de la socia es la venta de productos de primera necesidad como por ejemplo arroz, azúcar, fideos, gaseosas, refrescos, agua mineral y otras cosas. Ella es una persona responsable y amable que pertenece al banco comunal "Buena Vista" de la Asociación Arariwa desde hace varios años. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar tarros de leche, aceite, detergentes y gaseosas. 

Rosa María agrace a los inversionistas por el préstamo y se compromete a pagar las cuotas con mucha responsabilidad. 

(Huayopata es un Distrito Tealero, tiene un Centro Poblado San Pablo, su población aproximada es de 12 mil habitantes.)
texts.en:
Rosa María lives in the city of Huayopata, which is located in the La Convencion province in the department of Cusco.  She works selling basic necessity products, including rice, sugar, pasta, sodas, drinks, mineral water, and other items.  She is a responsible and kind person who has belonged to the Buena Vista community bank for many years.  

She is requesting this loan to purchase cans of milk, oil, detergents, and sodas.  She is grateful to the lenders for this loan and promises to make her payments responsibly.

loans.use: to purchase cans of milk, oil, detergents, and sodas.

loans.name: Leah

texts.en:
Leah is a married woman and a mother of four young children ages 7, 6, 3 and one. She lives with her family in Antequera, Bohol. Leah has been in the basket weaving business for more than 15 years now. 
Leah is asking for a loan to buy materials for basket weaving like bamboo and straw as well as materials for house repair including cement and wood. With this, she will be able to make more baskets and repair their house. 
In the future, Leah hopes to expand her business so that it will generate the revenue necessary to cover the needs of the family.

loans.use: to buy materials for basket weaving like bamboo and straw as well as materials to repair the house including cement and wood.

loans.name: Mazbut

texts.ru:
Мазбут жизнерадостный и трудолюбивый мужчина в возрасте 44 лет. Он женат и имеет несколько детей. Со своей небольшой семьёй Мазбут живёт в сельской деревушке. С юных лет Мазбут помогал своему отцу работать на поле. Он не смог получить высшего образования из-за финансовых трудностей в семье, поэтому также пошёл по стопам своего отца.  

Мазбут занимается собственным бизнесом. Этот бизнес выращивание сельхозкультуры. В основном он выращивает лук, помидоры и пшеницу. Для этого у него имеется небольшая площадь земли. Также на этой земле он пасёт скот, которых имеет, но их не так много. От своего бизнеса Мазбут получает хорошую прибыль и может тратить финансы на все нужды своей семьи. Также как дополнительный доход он получает от другого дела, он перевозит на своей машине людей из кишлака в город, и от этого тоже получает доход. Сейчас Мазбут начинает готовиться к новому посеву, и ему необходимо закупить семена лука и удобрения. Поэтому он обратился в Арванд и хочет получить кредит на покупку семян лука и удобрения для посева. Мазбут заранее благодарит Арванд за финансовую поддержку.
texts.en:
Mazbut is a resilient and hardworking 44-year-old man. He is married with a few children. He and his small family live in a rural village. 

Mazbut helped his father on the farm since his early years. He was not able to get a higher degree due to his family's financial situation, so he followed in his father's footsteps. He is a farmer, mostly growing onions, tomatoes and wheat. He has a small plot of land on which he also grazes his few cattle. 

He is able to earn a good profit and can cover all his family's financial needs. To supplement his farming income, he drives people from the village to the city. 

Mazbut is now starting to prepare for the new planting season and needs to buy onion seeds and fertilizer. He is requesting a loan from Arvand for these items. He thanks Arvand in advance for its financial support.

loans.use: to buy seeds.

loans.name: Annabelle

texts.en:
Anabelle is a married woman and a mother of six children from Antequera, Bohol. She has been engaged in a basket making business for more than 10 years now. Her husband works as a carpenter.

Anabelle is asking for a loan to buy materials for basket making, like bamboo and straw.  With this, she will be able to make more baskets and sell them to her customers. In the future, Anabelle hopes to expand her business so that it will generate more revenue. She also wants to save money for the schooling of her children.

loans.use: to buy materials for basket making, like bamboo and straw

loans.name: Nasiba

texts.en: Nasiba is married and has four children. She always wanted to provide them with a good education. Because her husband’s income is not enough to provide the family with a good quality of life, she decided to start a new sewing business. She took a course called ‘To Get Ahead’ offered by a women's organization and got enough business skills. Her children will help her with the business. She will be a very successful business woman, as she is hardworking and smart. She is asking for a loan of 1,000 TJS to buy a sewing machine for starting her new business. She awaits your support.

loans.use: To buy a sewing machine to start a new business

loans.name: Zuhro

texts.en: Zuhro was born in the year 1964. She is married and has adult children. Zuhro is a hardworking woman. She lives with her family happily but they are poor as her husband’s income is small from the farming business.  Zuhro decided to start her own business, a bakery. She took part in a course ‘To get Ahead’ from a women's organization and got a certificate.  She will cook biscuits, cakes, rolls, etc. and sell them at a local market. She is asking for a loan of 500 Somoni to buy an oven. She awaits your support.

loans.use: To buy an oven for organizing a new business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy solar lanterns for resale.

loans.name: Peregrin

texts.en:
Peregrin is a married man and a father of two children from Antequera, Bohol. He earns a living through his motorcycle transport business.

Peregrin is asking for a loan to buy gasoline and spare parts for his motorcycle like wheels, tires, chains and bolts. With this, he will be able to improve and maintain the good working condition of his motorcycle. Peregrin hopes to make his business a successful one.  Moreover, he wants to save money for the schooling of his children.

loans.use: to buy gasoline and spare parts for his motorcycle like wheels, tires, chains and bolts

loans.name: Rogelio

texts.en: Rogelio is 32-years-old, married and blessed with one child. He owns and manages a motorcycle repair shop.  He's been in this business for almost three years and earns a net of income amounting to PHP 15,000 a month.  With this business he would like to request a loan of PHP 30,000 to purchase spare motorcycle parts for his business. He's hoping that his business will improve more and become more profitable.

loans.use: To purchase spare motorcycle parts for his business.

location.town: Mabini St. District 3, Cauayan City, Isabela

loans.name: Lucresia

texts.en:
Lucresia is 65 years old and lives in her children's house. 

She has a retail store selling assorted groceries and beverages to generate income. She doesn't want to be a burden to her children, so she continues running this business to help with some of their household expenses. Lucresia has seven years of experience in this business and works every day in order to earn income.

Lucresia requested this loan to buy additional grocery goods to sell. She wants to save her revenue for her future needs.

loans.use: to buy additional grocery goods to sell

loans.name: Esther

texts.en:
Meet Esther, a farmer who has a ¼ acre farm in Chuka, where she lives with her husband and her three children, who are between the ages of 26 and 1 year. She really enjoys farming and more especially, attending to her animals. She has been in farming for 15 years, with her primary income coming from milk, eggs and bananas. Her biggest challenges in farming are diseases affecting crops and livestock.

Esther loves Juhudi Kilimo because of their continued support in helping farmers achieve their dreams. During the training, she learnt that microfinance institutions do help low-income earners to access funds.

This loan will enable her to purchase poultry that will boost up production and hence, an increase in income. This will improve their living standards and enable her children to access good education.

loans.use: to purchase poultry.

loans.name: Ruben

texts.en:
Ruben is 35 years old and lives in Kapan city in Syunik region. He is still not married. His father died several years ago, and he now lives with his mother. Ruben has vocational education and a specialty of electrician. 

Now Ruben works simultaneously in two places; he works at the Kapan State Theatre as an electrician and at the city hospital, also as an electrician. Sometimes he also takes private orders for doing some electrical repair work. Ruben’s mother also works at the same theatre. 

Lately, Ruben has had some problems with his health, and he cannot find the reason for feeling sick. So, he is asking for a loan of 100,000 Armenian drams to have an examination in order to find out the reason for his feeling unhealthy and weak, despite his young age.

loans.use: to have an examination in order to find out the reason for his feeling unhealthy and weak, despite his young age.

loans.name: Erick

texts.en:
Erick is a 24-year-old single man. He describes himself to be compassionate. 

Erick operates a transportation business and transports customers using his motorcycle. He has been involved in this business for two years. His business is located in a populated area. He describes his biggest business challenge to be bad weather. 

He will use the 20,000 KES loan to buy spare parts for his motorcycle. His business goal is to have a taxi within five years. 

Erick hopes that in the future, he will have a good lifestyle.

loans.use: to buy spare parts for his motorcycle

loans.name: Zulfiya

texts.en:
Zulfiya is 46 years old. She is married and has a son who is 20 years old. 

Zulfiya lives with her family in a village and has a good opportunity to develop a business with animal husbandry. She is going to organize a business with animal husbandry. She took part in a course called "To Get Ahead" through a women's organization and earned a certificate. 

She is asking for a loan of 1,000 TJS to buy cattle for organizing a new business. She awaits your support.

loans.use: to buy cattle for organizing a new business

loans.name: Janice

texts.en:
Father = Carpenter, mother = Housewife.

Janice, 20-years-old, lives with her parents and four siblings. Her father earns from his carpentry work while her mother does household chores.  She studies at the university taking up a Bachelor of Science in Criminology.  

She is requesting a loan to pay her tuition fees for the second semester for this current school year.  She wants her parents to be proud of her success.  In the future, she wants to become successful.

loans.use: to pay her school tuition fees

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more soft drinks for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a computer

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
Mary is 50-years-old, married and supports six members of her family. Her spouse helps fend for the family, too. She has a poultry farming business in Kapsabet and is served by VisionFund at the office in Kapsabet.

This has been her income generating business for the last 20 years. She gets an average monthly income of KES 20,000.  She plans to use the amount borrowed of KES 94,500 to buy chicks to expand her business. Her dream is to educate her children.

loans.use: to buy chicks

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy sewing material, shoes and clothes

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more fish, chicken, spare rib, etc., to expand her business.

loans.name: James

texts.en: James is a 40-year-old married man. He has 2 children ages 3 and 6 years. He describes himself as being determined. He operates a transport business where he transports customers using his bicycle. He has been involved in this business for 2 years. His business is located in a busy area and he has a variety of customers.  He describes his biggest business challenge to be weather.  He will use the Kes 20,000 loan to buy groceries to start a grocery store for his wife.  This will enable them to increase their family income. His business goal is to economically sustain his business within 5 years. This is his first loan with SMEP DTM.

loans.use: to help his wife start a grocery store to supplement the income he makes with his transport business.

loans.name: Artak

texts.en:
Artak is 30 years old and lives in Kapan city in the Syunik region. He is the only child in his family. 

His father died several years ago and now he lives with his mother. For many years, she worked as an adjuster in the capacitor, but now she is retired and helps her son with his business. 

For seven years, Artak has been running his fruit and vegetable trading business. He sells a great assortment of vegetables (greens, onions, potatoes, carrots, and more) and fruits (apples of different sorts, pears, peaches, lemons, bananas, and more). 

Artak drives around Kapan and Kadjaran with his own car and perfectly manages to sell all the products that he buys from the Yerevan wholesale market. He mainly buys fruit from the Ararat lowland and from the nearby villages of Kapan and Sisyan. 

Since his car has the most important function for his business, he tries to take care of it properly. So, he needs a loan to use for the purchase of car tires. He will also buy some vegetables and fruits for his business.

loans.use: to purchase car tires, vegetables, and fruits.

loans.name: Davit

texts.en:
Davit is 24 years old and lives in Kapan city in Syunik region. Davit has vocational education. He has worked at the Kapan Mine Enrichment Plant for three years and he does his best in order to help his mother in the care of their family. Davit lives with his mother and brother.  His mother has a small business of clothes trading. Davit’s father died two years ago and since then Davit and his mother try to overcome all the hardship that appears every day in their family. Davit’s brother is an invalid and it is a result of a disease, and the care of him, also the treatment activities of his disease are on Davit and his mother’s duty.

Davit asks for a loan, which they greatly need, for the treatment course of his brother. His brother needs treatment regularly and it is already high time of it to start.

loans.use: to pay for the treatment course of his brother, which he needs regularly and now it is already high time of it to start

loans.name: Natasha

texts.en: Natasha wants your financial help to cover the customs import charge since she brings thrifty items that she resells from neighboring countries.

loans.use: to pay for customs import charge of her second-hand inventory

loans.name: Maria Aminta

texts.es: Maria de 34 años de edad vive en casa propia con su familia, ella posee un molino desde hace varios años tiene mucha clientela principalmente las señoras que elaboran tortillas pues ahi llegan a moler el maiz para elaborarlas ya que ella es una persona muy amable y responsable, Maria solicita un credito para poder comprar cuchillas, discos y todas las herramientas necesarias para tener un buen molino y asi seguir con su trabajo para darles el sustento diario a su familia sin limitacion alguna.
texts.en:
Maria is 34 years old and lives in her own home with her family. She has owned a grain mill for several years. Her main customers are women who bring her corn to process so that they can make tortillas.

Maria is a friendly and responsible person. She is requesting a loan in order to buy blades, disks, and all of the equipment that she needs to keep her grain mill running. This will enable her to continue working so that she can provide for the daily needs of her family without any limitations.

loans.use: to buy blades, disks, and equipment for her grain mill.

loans.name: Victor Manuel

texts.es: Victor de 36 años de edad vive con su esposa y sus hijos en casa propia, el se dedica desde hace varios años a la agricultura siembra maíz y frijol, cuando su cosecha ya esta lista la almacena en los graneros que muestra la fotografía para luego comercializarla en los alrededores de la zona donde el reside, con lo que obtiene  e sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos que se le presentan en su hogar, Victor esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de insumos agricolas como: fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, herbicidas, etc. y así continuar con sus cultivos y darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Victor is 36 years old and lives in his own home with his wife and children. He has been farming for several years, growing corn and beans. When his crops are ready to be harvested, they are stored in granaries (as shown in the photograph) and eventually sold in the surrounding areas near where he lives.

With the revenue he generates from his sales, Victor is able to pay for a few of the household expenses. He is requesting a loan in order to buy farming supplies such as fertilizers, compost, pest controls, herbicides, and other items so that he can continue maintaining his crops and providing a better quality of life for his family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, compost, pest controls,  herbicides, and other supplies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more onions, cooking oil and maggi to expand her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy snack foods, basic grains, soft drinks, oil, coffee, sugar, and other products.

loans.name: Mastona

texts.en: Mastona is a young and purposeful women. She is married and has 2 children. Her children are non-adults. She began her own business with animal husbandry 11 years ago. Mastona has had a great experience in this field, and she runs her business well.  Her husband is a taxi driver, but his car is broken and he does not have money to repair it.  Mastona wants to help her husband. She is asking for a loan of 5,000 Somoni to repair her husband's car. She awaits your support.

loans.use: to pay to repair her husband's car so he can return to his taxi business.

loans.name: Khady's Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe a été crée depuis le début du banc villageois. Il est composé de 5 femmes issues du même village et unies par de bonnes relations sociales économiques et professionnelles.
Madame Arame est la responsable du groupe elle est âgée de cinquante trois ans mariée et mère de quatre enfants dont trois filles et un garçons. Elle debout a droite de la photo.
Elle s'active dans le commerce de patte d’arachide depuis bientôt dix ans et elle dispose d'une bonne expérience.
Son nouveau crédit de quatre cent quatre vingt dix mille francs CFA lui permettra de se payer des seaux de patte d’arachide qu'elle va revendre au détails au niveau du marché hebdomadaire de sa localité.
Les bénéfices réalisés lui permettent de prendre en charge les besoins alimentaires scolaires et sanitaires de ses enfants.
texts.en:
This group has been in existence since the launch of the banc villageois. It is composed of five women from the same village who maintain good social and working ties.

Mrs. Arame, the group's leader, is 53 years old, married, and the mother of four: three daughters and one son. She is standing on the right in the photo. 
For almost 10 years, she has been selling peanut paste and thus has plenty of experience.
Her new loan of 490,000 West African francs will allow her to buy pails of peanut paste to retail at the local weekly market. The derived revenue will allow her to cover expenses related to food, education and  healthcare for her children.

loans.use: to buy peanut paste for retailing.

loans.name: Gorret

texts.en:
Gorret is a single mother of four children, three of whom go to school. She also takes care of her paternal aunt. She has a business of selling green bananas and charcoal. She has been in this business for 10 years. 

She has applied for a loan of 500,000 UGX from MCDT-SACCO to buy more bunches of green bananas and bags of charcoal. She generates additional income from selling piped water. She works at the market seven days out of every week and sells on a retail basis. Her major business challenge includes seasonality and thieves. She is aspiring to sell wholesale only and also to start going to villages for green bananas. 

She decided to join MCDT-SACCO because of low interest charged. She resides in a rented house and the family has access to electricity but not to piped water. Her monthly expenses include school fees and rent.

loans.use: To buy more bunches of green bananas and bags of charcoal.

loans.name: Maria Ofelia

texts.es:
María de  57 anos, casada con un hijo, bajo su responsabilidad, el cual está estudiando, es originaria del Sauce, lugar que está ubicado en la zona norte de la región, se caracteriza por ser trabajadora, responsable, con ganas de superación personal. El sauce es una zona productora de leche y queso. Lamentablemente por falta de recursos económico no pudo cursar una carrera, y por la falta de ingresos se vio en la necesidad de trabajar desde temprana edad. En la actualidad lucha para brindarle un futuro mejor a sus hijos.
Gracia a su esfuerzo y sus ganas de salir adelante tiene por actividad económica la crianza de cerdos para l venta. El negocio lo tiene ubicado en su casa de habitación. El objetivo del crédito es invertir en capital de trabajo y comprar un lote de cerdos para que en un futuro no muy lejano pueda obtener mejores ingresos. María agradece la ayuda que los inversionistas kiva les brindan a personas de escasos recursos y países pobre como es Nicaragua para tener un medio de trabajo digno.
texts.en:
María is 57 years old and married with one child who is dependent on her and in school. She comes from El Sauce, a place located in the north of the region. She is known for being hard-working and responsible, with a great desire to get ahead in life. El Sauce is a zone where milk and cheese are produced. Unfortunately, because of the lack of economic resources, María was not able to study for a degree, and because of the lack of income, she needed to work from a young age. Currently, she is working hard to provide a better future for her children. 

Thanks to her effort and her desire to get ahead, she works raising pigs to sell. The business is located in the house where she lives. The aim of the loan is to invest in working capital by purchasing a batch of pigs, so that in the near future she can obtain a better income. María is grateful for the help provided by the Kiva investors to low-income people and poor countries such as Nicaragua, so that people will have a dignified way of earning a living.

loans.use: to buy a batch of pigs to raise and sell.

loans.name: Gloria Group

texts.en:
These three women who come from the same neighborhood are part of Gloria Group. They are bound by good social, economic, and business relationships. They are sell groceries and footwear. 

Gloria, age 32, is the group's representative. She's standing in the middle of the photograph. She's married and the mother of two children, one boy and one girl.

She's a merchant. Her new loan request of GHS 1,200 will enable her to buy groceries (assorted soaps, sugar, rice, Milo, milk, biscuits, canned food, etc.) to sell to customers. The generated profits will enable her to cover her children's food and health needs, but will also help strengthen her savings with the ID-Ghana.

loans.use: to buy groceries (assorted soaps, sugar, rice, Milo, milk, biscuits, canned food, etc.) to sell to customers.

loans.name: Katherine

texts.es: Gracias por apoyar a Katherine en la compra de mercancías con la cual surtió su negocio de  suéteres, fantasías,  y útiles escolares propios de la época, por lo cual logró ventas importantes, con las cuales logró mejorar sus condiciones habitacionales y hoy están más cómoda en su hogar con su familia. Ella dice a sus financiadores: Contar con su apoyo es fundamental para el desarrollo de los distintos proyectos y metas propuestas.“  En la actualidad Katherine está aplicando a un credikiva, mediante el cual comprará camisetas, pantalonetas, todo esto es para estudiantes de los colegios aledaños al negocio y en esto radica el éxito de la inversión mediante el préstamo de Kiva.
texts.en:
Thanks for supporting Katherine in the purchase of merchandise with which she has stocked her business with sweaters, jewelry, and seasonal school supplies, and has managed to make significant sales and improved her living conditions. Today Katherine is more comfortable in her home with her family. 

She tells her financial backers: "Having your support is fundamental for the development of different projects and proposed goals." Currently, Katherine is applying for a Kiva loan, which she will use to buy shirts, pants, and sports shorts, all for students of the neighboring schools around her business, therein lies the success of the Kiva loan.

loans.use: buy shirts, pants, and sports shorts for the students of the neighboring schools around her business.

loans.name: Helen Patricia

texts.es:
Helen tiene 40 años de edad, está casada y su esposo brinda servicios como vigilante, tiene 3 hijos los cuales tienen que transportarse 3 kilómetros para llegar a la escuela, y son los únicos que dependen de ella. 

Helen se dedica a la costura, pero desde hace un tiempo decidió poner una pequeña tienda, en la que vende paletas y helados,  en este pequeño negocio le apoya su esposo, así también ella obtiene ingresos de la costurería, un oficio que lo aprendió en los talleres a los que asistió.


El crédito que ella está solicitando, lo necesita para invertir en su negocio ya que quiere aumentar la cantidad de productos, pero por el momento no cuenta con capital disponible para invertir, además se le estará ayudando a crecer en el negocio y a obtener mayores ingresos para sacar adelante a su familia.


En un futuro, Helen sueña con tener un negocio más amplio en el que pueda vender otra clase de productos aparte de los que tiene por el momento, así también  espera  poder vender ropa que sea hecha por ella, sueña también con dejarle a sus hijos un negocio en el que ellos puedan continuar en un día que ella falte.
texts.en: Helen is 40 years old, married and her husband works as a security guard.  She has 3 children, who have to commute 3 kilometers in order to get to school, and they are her only dependents.  Helen is devoted to sewing, but a little while ago she decided to open a small store in which she sells popsicles and ice cream.  In this small business, her husband helps support her so that she can also get income from being a seamstress, work that she learned in the workshops that she attended.  The loan that she is requesting is to invest in her business as she would like to increase the quantity of products, but at the moment she cannot do that because she does not have the money available to invest.  Furthermore, it will be helping her to grow her business and to improve her income so that she can help improve her family's life.  In the future, Helena wishes to have a larger store in which she can sell other types of additional products.  She hopes to be able to sell clothing made by her.  She also dreams of leaving her children a business which they can continue working in on the day she is no longer there.

loans.use: to invest in the store and buy more products to sell.

loans.name: Pauline

texts.en: Pauline is a 24-year-old married woman. She has four children. She describes herself to be honest. She operates a farm where she grows crops. She has been involved in this business for 15 years. Her business is located in a viable location and her primary customers are of all types. She describes her biggest business challenge to be lack of capital. She will use the KES 30,000 loan to buy farm inputs to enable her to increase production. Her business goal is to be prosperous within five years. She hopes that in the future, she will be successful. This is her second loan with SMEP DTM. Her previous loan of KES 20,000 was repaid successfully.

loans.use: to buy farm inputs

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more onions, cooking oil and Maggi to expand her business.

loans.name: Rawthat- Almaharik Group

texts.en:
Rawthat- Almaharik is a group of four members. All of them are female and live in Aden, Yemen. They requested a loan of 250,000 YER from AMB.
Thika is a 27-year-old married woman who lives with her husband in their own house. She is the leader of the group. Thika and her spouse are living in miserable conditions since their house is very old and it needs prompt renovation. It is vulnerable to falling down at any time and it is known that such renovation requires a lot of money. Unfortunately, she doesn't have enough money, so she asked for a loan of 70,000 YER from AMB in order to purchase construction materials. She looks forward to finishing all the renovations for her house.

loans.use: to buy construction supplies to renovate the house

loans.name: Julio

texts.es:
En el distrito de la Venta, distrito caracterizado por  sus grandes paisajes de color verde debido a la agricultura que se desarrolla en la zona, vive Julio, un hombre muy trabajador que poco a poco ha ido saliendo adelante a pesar de las adversidades, Julio  vive al lado de su esposa y de sus 2 hijos, Tal es así que Julio hace hasta lo imposible por brindarles lo necesario para salir adelante y su sacrificio diario es por darle las oportunidades que él no tuvo. Es así que cada día el trabaja como Albañil, él labora alrededor de 8 horas al día, pero en ocasiones puede trabajar un poco mas dependiendo del tipo de construcción que realice; él  cree que está saliendo adelante en su trabajo porque es muy responsable y cuidadoso con su trabajo.

Julio está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que es la segunda vez que le dan su apoyo y en esta oportunidad gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá comprar una computadora para que el menor de sus hijos tenga una herramienta para realizar los trabajos de sus estudios, de esta manera seguir apoyando la educación de su hijos y seguir cada día trabajando para poder hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Darle una buena profesión a sus hijos y ver su casa terminada completamente”.
texts.en:
In the area of La Venta, a district caracterized by its great green landscapes due to the farming that is practiced in the area, lives Julio, a hardworking man that is little by little getting ahead despite adversities. Julio lives alongside his wife and two sons, who are the reason why he does everything possible to provide what is necessary to succeed, and his daily sacrifice is to give them opportunities he didn't have. This is why he work everyday as a carpenter. Julio works 8 hours a day, but on occasion, he can work a little more depending on the type of construction he's doing. Julio believes that he is succeeding at his job because he is very responsible and careful with his work. 

Julio is very grateful to Kiva's lenders as it is the second time that they have given him support, and thanks to the help they have offered him this time, he will be able to buy a computer so that the youngest of his sons can have a tool to do school work. In this way he can keep supporting his children's education and keep working each day to be able to make real his greatest dream: to give his sons a good profession and to see his house completely finished.

loans.use: buy a computer.

loans.name: Nahashon

texts.en: Nahashon is 22 years old, single and supports one member of his family. He buys green tea leaves from farmers for sale in Nandi County and is served by VisionFund Kenya's Kapsabet office. He has been in business for the last three years and he gets an average monthly income of KES 30,000. He plans to use the amount borrowed of KES 60,000 to pay school fees . He will use the profits from the tea selling business to repay his loan and expand his existing business.

loans.use: to pay school fees

loans.name: Sirush

texts.en:
Sirush is 41 years old. She lives in Stepanavan city in the Lori region. She has a higher pedagogical education. Now she works simultaneously in two places; she works at the school as a teacher of Mathematics and Informatics and she also works at the Stepanavan Agricultural College as a lecturer. Sirush also has several pupils whom she gives private courses in mathematics since they are going to pass entrance examinations. She is very patient, skilled and clever pedagogue and she spends much time with each pupil to explain the theme properly. Sirush’s husband also has a specialty of pedagogue, but since he wants to provide his family with better living conditions, he now works in the Russian Federation and he temporally transfers money to his family from there. They have a daughter, who is already a student, and like her parents, in the future she will become a teacher.
Sirush is asking for a loan of 300.000 Armenian drams in order to buy a computer since she wants to make her lessons more interesting and more informative and she thinks that the computer surely can help her to teach with new methods and with interesting information.

loans.use: to buy a computer

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more gari (cassave mash) to sell

loans.name: Sandra Elizabeth

texts.es:
Sandra, se dispone a solicitar un nuevo préstamo para efectuar la compra de un cerdo, condimentos, maíz, concentrado y maicillo para pollos de engorde, será de gran ayuda para seguir fortaleciendo el negocio, elaborar la venta de tamales, cmida y tener los ingresos económicos con los que cubre los gastos familiares, sobre todo para poder pagar los medicamentos que su madre necesita.
EL préstamo anterior le fue de mucha ayuda para mantenerse trabajando, aumento su producción. Sus ventas son mejores y con los nuevos ingresos a cancelado sus deudas y mejorado el estilo de vida familiar.
texts.en: Sandra has asked to take out a new loan in order to allow her to buy a pig, spices, corn, and millet for broiler chickens.  It will be of great help with continuing to strengthen the business, developing the sale of tamales, food, and having the financial resources to cover her common family expenses.  Above all, it will help her to pay for the medication that her mother needs.  The past loan was very helpful for her in order to keep herself working.  It increased her production.  Her sales are better and the new income canceled her debts and improved the daily lifestyle of her family.

loans.use: to buy a pig, spices, corn, and millet for broiler chickens

loans.name: Julia

texts.es:
Julia vive en la ciudad de Huayopata que está ubicado en la provincia de La Convención del departamento del Cusco. Su actividad económica principal es la venta de frutas como por naranjas, papayas, plátanos, guanabanas, mandarina, mangos y otras. Ella es una persona responsable y amable que pertenece al banco comunal "Buena Vista" de la Asociación Arariwa desde hace varios años. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para pagar la movilidad de traslado de las frutas.   

Julia agrace a los inversionistas por el préstamo y se compromete a pagar las cuotas con mucha responsabilidad.
texts.en:
Julia lives in the city of Huayopata, which is located in the province of La Convención of the department of Cusco. Her main economic activity is selling fruit such as oranges, papayas, bananas, soursop, tangerines, and mangos among others. She is a responsible and friendly person that has belonged to the communal bank "Buena Vista" of the Arariwa Association for several years. This time she is requesting the loan to pay the vehicle that transfers the fruit. 

Julia is grateful to the investors for the loan, and she promises to make the payments responsibly.

loans.use: pay the vehicle that transfers the fruits.

loans.name: Rene

texts.es:
René, le gusta la atención y facilidad de pago que se le da en la institución, además los beneficios que ha tenido del crédito anterior son muy positivos, tuvo a su disposición la materia prima para continuar elaborando pan y le realizo reparaciones a su vehículo. 
En está ocasión solicita un nuevo crédito que utilizara para comprar huevos, harina, manteca, azúcar, etc., así como también reparar el motor y la carrocería del vehículo en el que sale a repartir el pan.
texts.en: René likes both the attention and ease of payment that the institution has offered him.  In addition, he has benefited very positively from the assistance of the previous loan.  He had the primary materials at his disposal in order to continue baking bread and he was able to make repairs to his car.  On this occasion, he is requesting a new loan that he will use to buy eggs, flour, butter, sugar, etc. as well as to repair his motor and the body of his vehicle, which he has to use to go out and deliver the bread.

loans.use: to buy eggs, flour, butter, sugar, etc., as well as repair his car motor and the body of the vehicle.

loans.name: Anahit

texts.en:
This young lady is 23 years old and she lives with her parents in Vanadzor city in the Lori region. Anahit has graduated from Yerevan State Linguistic University and she is a specialist in English language and literature. Now she works at the Vanadzor Polytechnic College as a teacher of English. As she says, she likes her work, and despite her young age, she has already managed to have an individual approach to each child so that everyone in her class has a place and opinion during her lessons. She says she cannot leave the classroom until she gives an answers to all questions that may come up among her pupils during the learning process.

Anahit asks for a loan since she wants to buy a computer and some professional literature in order to use all the new methods and innovations in her teaching process.

loans.use: to buy a computer and some professional literature in order to use all the new methods and innovations in her teaching process

loans.name: Lule

texts.en:
This is Lule, whose name in English means "flower," and who is begging for your financial help. She is an ethnic Egyptian who has been photographed in front of her house. By looking at this picture, someone can tell how poor she unfortunately is. With this loan that she is requesting, she wants to build a little one-room house. She has already collected the building materials and is waiting for your kindness to lend to her so that she starts building right away.

Lule and her husband collect scrap metal and plastic for money, and also, they plant seasonal veggies in the agricultural land they own.

loans.use: to build a little one-room house

loans.name: Gida

texts.en:
Gida is married with two children, and all her children go to school. She doesn’t take care of additional family members. She has a business of selling cosmetics and has been this business for two years. 

She has applied for a loan of 1,200,000 Uganda shillings from MCDT-SACCO to buy more boxes of cream relaxers, Vaseline, weaves and hair conditioners. She moves door to door selling those cosmetics and sells on a retail basis six days out of every week. Her major business challenges include transportation and seasonality. She is aspiring of getting a permanent business premises and also to buy a plot of land and build rental houses. 

She resides in the family house, and the family has access to electricity and piped water. Her monthly expenses includes school fees and feeding the family.

loans.use: To buy boxes of cream relaxers, Vaseline, weaves and hair conditioners.

loans.name: Sharleny

texts.es:
Sharleny es un joven estudiante de medicina, ella solicita un préstamo para poder pagar sus gastos educativos, esta es su historia:Soy Sharleny, tengo 25 años de edad, nací y crecí en el sector María Auxiliadora, Santo Domingo en la cual actualmente resido con mi madre. Soy madre soltera y actualmente no percibo ingresos por problemas de salud, los ingresos que recibimos en mi hogar es por parte de mis tres hermanos mayores los cuales ya han formado su propia familia. 
Los ingresos que recibimos mi madre y yo son insuficientes para poder terminar mi carrera de Medicina ya iniciada en el Instituto Tecnológico de Santo Domingo donde me faltarían 8 trimestres. No me visualizo haciendo nada más en mi vida que sea verme atendiendo pacientes y salvando vidas, porque estudiar Medicina significa poder ayudar a los demás y contribuir a la sociedad haciendo que mis conocimientos y mis manos sean instrumentos de bien y aportando mi granito de arena sirviendo tanto en el ámbito profesional como humanitario.
Obtener este préstamo es una oportunidad inmensa para mí porque si no lo obtengo no tendría forma de concluir la carrera de medicina, lo cual es mi sueño desde que era pequeña y concluyendo mis estudios también puedo ser un aporte para mi madre.
texts.en:
Sharleny is a young medicine school student and is asking for this loan to pay her tuition costs. This is her story: I am Sharleny, I am 25 years old and was born and raised in the Maria Auxiliadora sector of Santo Domingo, where my mother currently lives.

I am a single mother and I currently do not receive income for health problems. The income that we receive in my home comes from my three older brothers who have formed their own families.

The income that my mother and I receive is insufficient to finish my degree in medicine, which I have already started at the Technological Institute of Santa Domingo. I only have eight more trimesters left to finish my studies. I don’t see myself doing anything in my life other than tending to patients and salving lives because studying medicine means helping others and contributing to society using my knowledge and my hands as instruments of good. I will contribute what I can to be both professional and caring.

Receiving this loan is a huge opportunity for me because if I do not get it I will have no way to finish my medicine degree, which has been my dream since I was little. Finishing my studies can also help out my mother.

loans.use: to pay higher education costs.

loans.name: Anna

texts.en:
Anna is 40 years old, and she lives in Vanadzor city in Lori region. She is married and has a large family; she lives with her husband and three sons. 

Anna’s husband works at the sanatorium; her elder son and second son work as a food suppliers; and her smallest son is still school-aged. Despite all of the grown-up men in her family being employed, Anna’s financial support from her small business is great. At the Vanadzor wholesale market, she rents a cute stall where she sells curtains, covers and towels. She has been in this business for six years, and she says that she has a number of loyal customers who do shopping from her stall regularly. 

Now, Anna, with the coming of spring, wants to renew her stall assortment with new, colorful and nice products and materials, and she also wants to buy some children's clothes to try to sell as well, with the hope of some more income for her big family.

loans.use: to buy some children's clothes to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more fish, rice, palm oil and cooking seasonings to expand her business.

loans.name: Nana

texts.en:
Nana is a 36-year-old married woman from the village Odishi. She lives with her husband, daughter and son. Nana's husband is an artisan and gets approximately 200 GEL (Georgia lari) monthly. Nana runs a small agricultural activity; she is engaged in cattle and milk-cow breeding, and in cultivating a plot of agricultural land, where she grows nuts. The gained products are sold locally. 

Despite these activities the family doesn't have significant income for living in satisfying conditions, so Nana requested a loan in order to increase the family's income. Her request was approved, and she will use the requested amount for starting a trading business. Specifically, she will purchase kitchen utensils and blankets at wholesale prices and will sell in her community at an increased price. With the help of this new activity, Nana will be able to make a better living for her children and will tackle financial difficulties. She will sell a wide assortment of the mentioned products and will get private orders also. She will be grateful for the help maintaining her trading business.

loans.use: To start a trading business with home products such as kitchen utensils and blankets

loans.name: Pjeter

texts.en:
Pjeter is somewhat blind; he is 48, married and has three children. Prior to arriving to the current village, they lived in the Alps of the country, where due to the weather condition and geographical terrain they could not plant anything. Their lives and other highlanders or ‘malesore’ in Albanian were very hard and they remained  inside their homes for almost 6 months due to the heavy snow.  According to Pjeter, it is so much better at their current location.

He is requesting a loan from Kiva lenders to help him pay for plowing and preparing the land for seasonal planting.  Pjeter and his wife practice agriculture and livestock as a source of income.  They sell baby calves and raw milk to a nearby dairy farm and also dried beans, wheat, and watermelon.

loans.use: to plow and prepare the agricultural land for seasonal planting

loans.name: Arsen

texts.en:
Arsen is 46 years old and he lives in Vanadzor city in Lori region. Arsen has vocational education in construction and now he does hired construction work around his city. He works a lot and he is ready to work more in order to earn as much as possible, since he has numerous problems to solve in his family and he is the only breadwinner. Arsen is divorced and his daughter and son live with him. His mother is retired and she also lives with them and greatly helps Arsen in the care of his children.

Arsen, despite of his day and night work, has a great lack of money at this very important period for his family, especially for his daughter. He asks for a loan of 250,000 Armenian drams to organize his daughter’s engagement party and he hopes greatly to be supported by Kiva and its field partner Nor Horizon.

loans.use: to organize his daughter’s engagement party

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more gari for resale.

loans.name: Maria Julia

texts.es: Con 52 años de edad María se dedica a la elaboración y venta de tamales (comida típica preparada a base de masa de maíz, verduras y carne). La venta la realiza de forma ambulante en las principales zonas de su localidad y gracias a su carisma y experiencia en el mercado ya cuenta con  buen número de clientes que cada día la prefieren más. Como muchas mujeres Salvadoreñas María es madre soltera de dos hijos de 17 y 16 años de edad quienes se encuentran estudiando gracias al gran esfuerzo que ella realiza tanto para llevar el sustento diario como para darles mejores condiciones de vida. Su deseo es que sus hijos se preparen y puedan tener  mejores condiciones de vida a las que ella ha tenido acceso. Gracias al programa de Créditos Comunitarios que FUSAI ofrece a clientes como María es posible que pueda tener acceso a un financiamiento y poco a poco ir mejorando sus condiciones habitacionales. Como toda  mujer visionaria María ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito para invertir en la construcción de la cocina por lo que  necesita comprar materiales como: lámina galvanizada y madera. Expresa tener la capacidad de pago mensual que el crédito implica.
texts.en:
Maria, 52, makes and sells tamales, a typical food of corn tortillas stuffed with vegetables and meat.  She sells the food on the street in the main areas of her town and thanks to her personality and experience in the market she has a healthy number of loyal customers.  

Like a lot of women in El Salvador, Maria is a single mother.  She has two children, aged 17 and 16, who are studying at the moment thanks to the effort she has made every day to look after them and raise them.
