Veronica, 25, lives with her daughter in the Cayalti district, which is a community that works in agriculture, trade and livestock. Cayalti is located in the province of Chiclayo, which belongs to the Lambayeque region in the northern coast of Peru.

She has a small shop where she offers a variety of groceries such as rice, oil, sugar, eggs, and cereals among other things. Her shop is known in the area for the great service that it offers. She is asking for a loan from Edpyme Alternativa of 1000 nuevos soles to purchase a variety of products to grow her business and earn a higher income.

loans.use: to buy a variety of groceries such as rice, oil, and sugar to grow her business.

loans.name: Jose Milo

texts.es:
José Milo tiene 42 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa e hijos en el Caserío de San Luis, una zona rural del distrito de Santo Tomás, una comunidad de clima variado, con relieve accidentado en los que se puede apreciar colinas de bosques verdes ubicada cerca al Parque Nacional de Cutervo ubicada en la Provincia de Cutervo que pertenece a la Región Cajamarca, sierra norte del Perú.

El se dedica a la agricultura, especialmente al cultivo de cafeto de la variedad catimor sembrando 2 has de su propiedad, dedicándose a esta actividad desde hace 5 años, ha solicitado un préstamo de 1 500 nuevos soles para la compra de abonos para dar mantenimiento a su cultivo de cafe y de esta manera tener una producción oportuna para ofrecer a sus clientes.
texts.en:
José Milo is 42 years old.  He lives together with his wife and children in the hamlet of San Luis, a rural area of the Santo Tomás district.  It is a community with a variable climate, having an uneven terrain.  It is near the Cutervo National Park, located in the Cutervo province, which belongs to the Cajamarca region in the northern mountains of Perú.

José Milo works in farming, particularly the cultivation of coffee trees of the Catimor strain, sowing two hectares of his property.  He has done this work for five years.  He has asked for a loan of 1,500 nuevos soles to buy soil amendments for the maintenance of his coffee crop.  In this way, he can have a good harvest to offer his customers.

loans.use: to buy soil amendments to maintain his coffee crop

loans.name: Rosa Maria

texts.es:
Este préstamo es parte de las lineas de créditos "Credi Yapa" de la Asociación Arariwa, que permite los prestatarios con un buen historial de crediticio a recibir un especial préstamo, Credi Yapa es un pequeño préstamo, además de su préstamo regular, que tiene un calendario de pagos flexible de cuatro meses.

Rosa María se dedica a la venta de productos de primera necesidad como por ejemplo arroz, azúcar, fideos, gaseosas, refrescos, agua mineral y otras cosas. Ella es una persona responsable y amable que pertenece al banco comunal "Buena Vista" de la Asociación Arariwa desde hace varios años. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar sacos de arroz y sacos de azúcar.  

Rosa María agrace a los inversionistas por el préstamo y se compromete a pagar las cuotas con mucha responsabilidad.
texts.en:
This loan is part of the “Credit Yapa” line of credit of the Asociacion Arariwa, which allows borrowers with good credit history to receive a special loan. Credit Yapi is a small loan, in addition to their regular loan, that has a flexible payment schedule of four months. 

Rosa Maria sells staple goods such as rice, sugar, pasta, sodas, refreshments, mineral water and other things. She is a responsible and friendly person that has belonged to the communal bank “Buena Vista” of the Asociacion Arariwa for various years. In this opportunity, she needs the loan to buy bags of rice and sugar. 

Rosa Maria thanks the investors for the loan and she promises to responsibly pay the loan payments.

loans.use: to buy bags of rice and sugar.

loans.name: Adjo Marie

texts.fr:
Marie est une femme qui aime beaucoup le petit commerce. Elle a un enfant à charge. Elle a commencé le commerce de céréales, de tubercule et du charbon de bois. Elle s'approvisionne 2 fois par mois dans la ville de Notsè localité située à 120 kilomètres de Lomé. Actuellement son stock de maïs et de tubercules d'igname sont épuisés et elle ne fait que le commerce des fruits.
Elle souhaite augmenter son stock afin de mieux satisfaire ses clients et sollicite ce crédit pour acheter 2 paniers de tubercules d'igname et un sac de maïs.
texts.en: Marie is a woman who likes small-scale commerce a lot. She has one child to support. She started a business involving grains, tubers, and charcoal. She gets her supplies twice a month in the village of Notsè, located 120 km from Lomé. At this time, her stock of corn and yam tubers is exhausted, and she can only sell fruit. She would like to increase her stock in order to satisfy her customers and is requesting this loan to purchase 2 baskets of yam tubers and a sack of corn.

loans.use: to purchase a sack of corn and 2 baskets of tubers

loans.name: Seruka Group

texts.fr:
Floribert  fait partie du groupe  Seruka et  habite à Cibitoke. Il a 40 ans est marié à Médiatrice une cultivatrice. Ensemble ils ont 7 enfants âgés de 2 à 19 ans dont 4 étudient. 

Il fait le commerce des habits et des chaussures  depuis   15 ans. 

Il est à son premier crédit à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’il   obtient, il va  augmenter son capital et acheter  beaucoup d’habits et de chaussures  à revendre pour gagner plus. 

Dans les prochaines  années, il voudrait construire une belle maison, acheter une voiture de déplacement  et  voir ses enfants  étudier.
texts.en:
Floribert is part of the group Seruka and lives in Cibitoke. He is 40 years old and married to Médiatrice, a farmer. Together they have seven children, from 2 to 19 years old, of whom four are students. 

Floribert has been doing commerce in clothing and shoes for fifteen years. 

This is his first Turame loan. With the KIVA loan he is obtaining, he is going to increase his capital and purchase large amounts of clothing and shoes to resell, so as to earn more.

In the coming years, he would like to build a nice house, purchase a car to go from place to place, and see his children educated.

loans.use: to purchase large amounts of clothing and shoes to resell, so as to earn more

loans.name: Maria Elena

texts.es:
Este préstamo es parte de las lineas de créditos "Credi Yapa" de la Asociación Arariwa, que permite los prestatarios con un buen historial de crediticio a recibir un especial préstamo: Credi Yapa es un pequeño préstamo, además de su préstamo regular, que tiene un calendario de pagos flexible de seis meses.

Maria Elena se dedica a la venta de productos de primera necesidad como por ejemplo leche, azúcar, aceite, galletas y arroz, ella tiene una pequeña tienda de abarrotes donde expende sus productos. En esta oportunidad requiere un prestamo adicional al normal para comprar sacos de arroz y sacos de azúcar.  

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This loan is part of the “Credit Yapa” line of credit of the Asociacion Arariwa, which allows borrowers with good credit history to receive a special loan. Credit Yapa is a small loan, in addition to their regular loan, that has a flexible payment schedule of six months. 

Maria Elena sells staple goods such as milk, sugar, oil, crackers and rice. She has a small grocery store where she sells her products. For this opportunity, she needs an additional loan to buy bags of rice and sugar.

She is happy about the loan and promises to comply with all the loan payments.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, milk and crackers at wholesale.

loans.name: Teobaldo

texts.es:
Teobaldo tiene 34 años de edad, vive con su esposa y tiene dos hijas menores de edad que estudian en el colegio del caserío Minas, una zona rural del distrito de Querocotillo, la casa que habita es de material rustico y la habitan hace 8 años, ubicada en la Provincia de Cutervo que pertenece a la Región Cajamarca, sierra norte del Perú.

El se dedica a criar y comercializar ganado vacuno hace 03 años y también realiza labores agrícolas; actualmente siembra 1 ha de cultivo de café, su esposa le apoya en esta labor, ha solicitado un préstamo de 2 000 nuevos soles para la compra de ganado dos toretes para posteriormente engordarlo y ofrecerlo a un mejor precio.
texts.en: Teobaldo is 34 years old.  He lives with his wife and two small daughters who go to school in the village of Minas, a rural zone in the Querocotillo district, located in Cutervo province, which belongs to the Cajamarca region in Northern Sierra, Peru.  He has lived in is rustic home for eight years.  He has been engaged in raising and selling livestock for three years and is also engaged in farm work.  Currently, he is planting one coffee crop and his wife helps him with the work.  He has requested a loan of 2,000 nuevos soles to purchase livestock and two young bulls, which he will fatten and subsequently sell at a better price. .

loans.use: to purchase livestock.

loans.name: Yawa

texts.fr:
Yawa est une femme mariée âgée de 30 ans. Elle a 3 enfants et habite le quartier de Bè. Elle a commencé son activité génératrice de revenus depuis 1995 et faisait la restauration du Riz et du haricot. 
Après avoir accouché, elle a dû abandonner cette activité pour se consacrer à la vente des plats et des verres à boire.
Cette activité lui procure des revenus croissants et lui permet d'aider son mari dans les dépenses de la famille.
Ce crédit qu'elle sollicite lui permettra d'acheter 2 cartons de plats et 2 cartons de verres à boire.
texts.en: Yawa is a 30-year-old married women. She has three children and lives in the Bè district. She started her revenue-generating business in 1995 and used to sell cooked rice and beans. After giving birth, she had to abandon this business to devote herself to selling plates and drinking glasses. This business brings in more and more income and enables her to help out her husband in covering family expenses. This loan she is requesting will allow her to purchase 2 boxes of plates and 2 boxes of drinking glasses.

loans.use: to purchase 2 boxes of plates and 2 boxes of drinking glasses.

loans.name: Juan Manuel

texts.es:
Juan Manuel tiene 33 años de edad, vive con su esposa y su hijo, en el distrito de Colasay, un distrito de bosques verdes, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Jaén que pertenece a la Región Cajamarca, sierra norte del Perú, sierra norte del Perú.

El tiene un horno artesanal que se dedica a la elaboración de diversos tipos de panes, galletas y pasteles, desde hace 6 años, cuenta con clientela considerable, ha solicitado un préstamo de 3 000 nuevos soles para la compra de fuentes, moldes y carritos para implementar su panadería y de esta manera tener mejores facilidades para abastecer de su producto a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Juan Manuel, 33, lives with his wife and their son in the Colasay district which is known for its green forests and its citizens that work mainly in agriculture, trade and livestock. Colasay is located in the Provincia de Jaen which is part of the Cajamarca region in the northern mountains of Peru.

He has an artisanal oven which for the past six years he has used to bake various types of breads, cookies, and pastries. Juan Manuel has a considerable amount of customers and is asking for a loan of 3000 nuevos soles to buy pans, racks and cooling shelves to include in his bakery. With these additions, he will have better facilities to provide his products to his customers.

loans.use: to buy pans, racks and cooling shelves to include in his bakery.

loans.name: Marielita De Los Milagros

texts.es:
Marielita de los Milagros tiene 35 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa e hijos en el distrito de Buenos Aires, una comunidad que se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería ubicada en la Provincia de Morropon que pertenece a la Región Piura, costa norte del Perú.

Junto a su esposo tienen una tienda donde se dedica a la venta de abarrotes y cerveza desde hace más de cinco años , su esposo se encarga de abastecer su tienda y Marielita realiza las ventas, son una familia unida, Ella ha solicitado un préstamo de 600 nuevos soles para comprar variedad de golosinas y de esta manera ofrecer a sus clientes , generando mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Marielita de los Milagros is 35 years old. She lives with her husband and children in the Buenos Aires district. The community dedicated to farming, business and raising livestock is located in the Morropon province which is in the Piura region on the northern coast of Perú.

She has had a store with her husband where she sells groceries and beer for more than five years. Her husband is in charge of stocking the store and Marielita is in charge of the sales. They are a united family. She is requesting a loan of 600 nuevos soles to purchase a variety of candy to offer to her customers. This purchase will generate greater profits for her family.

loans.use: purchase a variety of candy to grow her business.

loans.name: Dolorosa Encarnacion

texts.es:
En el sitio Resbalón del  cantón Rocafuerte se  reúnen cada quince días las socias del Grupo De Crédito Primavera. En este lugar la mayoría de las personas se dedican a la agricultura y venta de sus productos así como también a la preparación de dulces que son reconocidos en todo el país.
En este lugar vive la señora Dolorosa, tiene 55 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre  pero no ha podido tener hijos propios. Pero tiene tres hijos de crianza los mismos que desde pequeños acogió en su hogar y que son como de ella, todos son mayores de edad con ella vive una de ellos. El marido es comerciante. 
Doña Dolorosa es una gran mujer que le gusta ayudarle a su marido a sacar adelante su hogar, ellos tienen una finca en la cual cultivan cocos que venden a comerciantes mayoristas, su esposo tiene un carro en el cual además de vender sus cocos también recorre el sitio comprando a sus vecinos mas cocos para revender.  El realiza dos o tres viajes por semana ya que tiene que llevar esta fruta al mercado mayorista a entregara  a comerciantes de este lugar o a camiones que llevan hasta la ciudad de Guayaquil a vender dicho producto. 
Este crédito lo van a emplear para comprar cocos. Esta desde el inicio en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque los créditos le son de mucha ayuda. Sus sueños son tener buena salud ella y los suyos.
texts.en:
The members of Primavera Communal Bank meet every two weeks in Resbalón, in Rocafuerte Canton.  Most of the people there work in agriculture and sell their crops.  They also make candy that's renowned throughout the country.

This is where Dolorosa lives.  She's 55 years old and in a common-law relationship.  She hasn't been able to have her own children, although she raised three children from a young age.  She accepted them into her home and it's as if they're her own.  They're all grown, and one of them lives with her.  Dolorosa's husband is a merchant.

Dolorosa's a great woman who likes to help her husband get the household ahead.  They have a farm where they grow coconuts to sell to wholesale vendors.  Her husband has a cart in which, in addition to selling their coconuts, he also goes are buying more coconuts from their neighbors to sell.  He makes two or three trips a week because he has to deliver the fruit to the wholesale market for the merchants there or for trucks who take the fruit to Guayaquil to sell.

Dolorosa's going to use this loan to buy coconuts.

She has been with the communal bank since the beginning, and she likes it because the loans are a big help.  Her dream for herself and her loved ones is to be healthy.

loans.use: to buy coconuts

loans.name: Eladio

texts.es:
Eladio tiene 36 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa e hijos en el distrito de Pucará una comunidad de clima caluroso, su población se dedica a la agricultura, especialmente al cultivo de arroz, café y piñas, ubicada en la Provincia de Jaén que pertenece a la Región Cajamarca, sierra norte del Perú.

El se dedica a la venta de frutas, bebidas de gaseosa y golosinas, su negocio se encuentra ubicada en su domicilio, cuenta con clientela considerable, ha solicitado un préstamo de 3 000 nuevos soles para la compra de variedad de fruta de estación y golosinas para ampliar su negocio y de esta manera generar mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Eladio is 36 years old and lives with his wife and children in the district of Pucará, a community in a sweltering climate. Its population is dedicated to agriculture, especially to the cultivation of rice, coffee and pineapples and is located in the Jaén province, which belongs to the Cajamarca Region in the Northern Sierras of Perú. 

He is dedicated to the sale of fruit, soft drinks and candies. His business is located in his home and he boasts a considerable clientele. He has requested a loan of 3,000 nuevos soles for the purchase of a variety of seasonal fruits and candies to stock his business, and therefore generate greater income for his family.

loans.use: to purchase a variety of seasonal fruits and candies.

loans.name: Walter Ismael

texts.es:
Walter Ismael tiene 52 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa e hijos en el distrito de Morropon, una comunidad que se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia del mismo nombre, que pertenece a la Región Piura, costa norte del Perú.

El se dedica a la venta de pescado en el mercado de su distrito, su esposa e hijos le apoyan en la venta , son una familia unida que se esfuerza en la labor que realizan, ha solicitado un préstamo de 2 000 nuevo soles para la compra de una refrigeradora y cubetas para mantener en buen estado la variedad de pescados que ofrece a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Walter Ismael is 52 years old and lives with his wife and children in the district of Morropon, a community dedicated to agriculture, trade and ranching, located in the province of the same name which belongs to the Piura Region in the northern coast of Perú. 

He is dedicated to the sale of fish in his districts' market. His wife and children help him with the sales. They are a close family which is strengthened in the work that they complete. He has requested a loan of 2,000 nuevo soles for the purchase of a refrigerator and trays to keep the variety of fish fresh that he offers to his customers.

loans.use: to purchase a refrigerator and trays to hold fish.

loans.name: Jessica Alexandra

texts.es:
Ella se jessica una mujer de aproximadamente 21 años, en ese momento se dirigía al colegio del hijo y se estaba preguntando el por que no seguía estudiando si ella era una estudiante pila, así fue pasando el transcurrir cuando llego a la casa después de un día de trabajo y hablo con la hermana y le dijo que ella quería seguir estudiando, pero ella no sabia como manejar el tiempo, la hermana le dijo que ella era una mujer luchadora y que si podía estudiar que lograra ese proyecto de vida que desde que era una niña querías ser una contadora. 
Esa mujer en ese momento llevo la imaginación a volar y dijo que quería estudiar para poder darle un futuro al pequeño hijo que el fuese profesional cuando grande y poder comprarle la casa a la madre que ha sido el apoyo desde que esa mujer fue mamá. 

Esa mujer quiere ser una gran contadora publica, ser una profesional honesta y perseverante para así ser competente en este campo laboral, esa mujer quiere estudiar para poder cumplir un gran objetivo, ser una gran profesional y poder brindarle a la familia bienestar y estabilidad económica.

Ella necesita el convenio porque los ingresos que tiene en el trabajo no son suficientes para pagar el semestre y aportar con los gastos en la casa.
texts.en:
This is Jessica, an approximately 21 year-old woman.  At one point she was going to her child’s school and was asking herself why she didn’t keep studying if she was a clever student.  She spent the journey this way; when she arrived home after a day of work and spoke with her sister, she said to her that she wanted to keep studying, but she didn’t know how to manage her time.  Her sister said to her that she was a persistent woman and that she really could manage to study; since she was a child, she wanted to be an accountant.

At that moment, that woman let her imagination fly and she said that she wanted to study to give her small child a future, so that when he was big he could be a professional and could buy a house for the mother who had been a support to him for as long as she had been a mother.

That woman wants to be a great public accountant and an honest professional.  She wants to be perseverant so that she can be competent in her work.  That woman wants to study to be able to reach her goal, to be a great professional and be able to give her family financial stability and wellbeing.

Jessica needs this loan because the income that she has in her job isn’t enough to pay for her semester and also help out with the household expenses.

loans.use: to pay for one semester's registration

loans.name: Yanira Magdalena

texts.es: Yanira de 37 años de edad vive con su esposo y sus tres hijos menores de edad (2 niños de 12 y 5 años y 1 niña de 10 años de edad). Su esposo se dedica a vender pan frances y pan dulce, Yanira vende verduras y productos de belleza en la colonia que habitan. Yanira necesita cambiar la lámina del techo y paredes que como se puede observar en la fotografía están muy corroídas. Yanira ha solicitado un crédito a FUSAI para comprar toda la lámina galvanizada para instalar en el techo y paredes de su vivienda. Ella se compromete a pagar todas las cuotas que este crédito implica.
texts.en:
Yanira is 37 years old and lives with her husband and their three young children (two sons ages 12 and 5, and a 10-year-old daughter). Her husband sells French bread and sweet bread. Yanira sells vegetables and beauty products in the neighborhood where they live.

Yanira needs to replace the metal sheets that make up the roof and walls of her house. As seen in the photo, they have severely corroded. She is requesting a loan from FUSAI so that she can buy all of the galvanized sheets that she needs to repair the roof and walls of her home. Yanira promises to complete all of her loan payments.

loans.use: to buy galvanized sheets so that she can repair the roof and walls of her home.

loans.name: Aliboy

texts.ru:
Алибой умелый мастер на все руки. Очень хозяйственный мужчина. Женат и имеет троих детей. Двое из них еще школьники. Один окончил школу и помогает отцу по хозяйству и трудиться вместе с ним, чтобы принести в дом дополнительные деньги. Жена Алибоя охраняет семейный очаг, но и не сидит сложа руки. Всячески помогает мужу и детям, доит коров и продает молоко.  У Алибоя среднее образование. Они живут в селе Уткансой. На этой местности очень удобно и прибыльно разводить КРС и МРС. Большинство жителей имеют овец или коров.
  А у Албоя десятилетний стаж по разведению коров. У его коров всегда парное и вкусное молоко, место коров всегда чистые и все коровы здоровые. Днем выводит их на пастбище, где весною всегда много свежей и зеленой травы. Его сын присматривает за ними, когда отец уходит по делам. У Алибоя есть еще одна профессия. Он каменщик и принимает заказы в строительстве домов. Полученный доход от мастерства тратит на ежедневные расходы семьи, а  доходы со скота копит на приобретение более важных вещей, которые требуют больших затрат. У Алибоя много планов, и один из них это купить одного скота и запасать корм. Но на данный момент не имеет нужную сумму на руках, поэтому решил воспользоваться кредитом. Очень надеется, что  «Кива»  поможет  ему в реализации его планов. Заранее благодарит за поддержку.
texts.en:
Aliboy is a skilled handyman and very capable around the home. He is married and has three children. Two of them are still in school, and the third has graduated and helps his father, working alongside him to bring enough income home. Aliboy's wife takes care of the home, but doesn't sit idle; she helps her husband and children in every way, milks the cows and sells the milk. Aliboy has a high school education. They live in the village of Utkansoy, a place where it is very convenient and profitable to raise livestock. The majority of residents have sheep or cows.

Aliboy too has a decade of experience taking care of cattle. His cows always have fresh and delicious milk, the place where they live is always clean and the cows are all healthy. During the day he sends them out to pasture, where in the springtime there is always a lot of fresh green grass. His son watches after them, while his father runs errands. Aliboy has another profession: he is a mason and takes orders in home construction. The income received from his trade goes toward the family's daily expenses, and the income from the cattle toward more important things with higher costs. Aliboy has a lot of plans, and one of them is to buy a cow and some feed. But at the moment he doesn't have enough money on hand, and therefore he has decided to ask for a loan. He hopes very much that Kiva will help him to realize his plans, and he sends thanks in advance for the support.

loans.use: to buy a cow and feed so that he can sell more milk

loans.name: Zioda

texts.ru:
Зиёда  положительная  трудолюбивая женщина ,  замужем.  Ей 48 лет. Вместе с мужем они на протяжении многих лет занимаются  животноводством и переработкой молока.  У нее большая семья четверо детей.  У Зиёды среднее образование и у её мужа также среднее образование.  Конечно  они мечтают чтобы в будущем их дети стали образованными людьми. Они уделяют большое внимание образованию детей. Зиёда на равне с мужем трудится по хозяйству и помогает уме содержать  поголовье скота. Для такой большой семьи как у Зиёды необходимо много затрат и конечно доход от животноводства покрывает затраты  на питание, одежду и прочие  мелкие расходы но откладывать на будущее детей и их  образование не получается. 
 Зиёда  хочет приобрести еще одну корову так как потребность в коровьем   молоке возрастает и она надеется, что  доход от этого дела принесет ее большой семье дополнительную возможность  для инвестиций в образование детей. Зиёда уже брала кредит в «Арванде» и у нее хорошая кредитная история. Полученный кредит помог бы ей в в реализации ее цели.
texts.en:
Zioda is a positive, hardworking woman. She is 48 and married with four children. She and her husband have been working in animal husbandry and milk sales for many years. She has a high school education, as does her husband. Of course, they dream that their children will become educated people in the future, and they pay a lot of attention to their children's education. Zioda works as hard as her husband around the house and helps him take care of the cattle. Such a big family, of course, has many expenses and while the earnings from the animals cover food, clothing and the other small costs, little is left for the future of the children and their education.

Zioda wants to acquire one more cow, since demand for milk is increasing and she hopes that the extra income will bring greater possibilities to her big family so they can invest in the children's education. Zioda has had a loan from Arvand before and has a good credit history. The loan received would help her to realize her goals.

loans.use: to buy a cow so she can sell more milk

loans.name: Wilfreda

texts.en:
Wilfreda is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a vegetable vending business in the Philippines.

She is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to purchase additional sacks of vegetables to sell for her vegetable vending business.

Wilfreda has been in this business for 22 years. She earns more income from farming corn and sugarcane.

Wilfreda has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving money to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to purchase additional sacks of vegetables to sell

loans.name: Gloria

texts.en:
Gloria is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a vegetable vending business in the Philippines.

She is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to purchase additional sacks of vegetables to sell for her vegetable vending business.

Gloria has been in this business for 30 years. She earns more income from farming corn and sugarcane.

Gloria has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving enough money so she could afford to send her children to college in the future.

loans.use: to purchase additional sacks of vegetables to sell

loans.name: Bokhetah Group

texts.en:
Bokhetah is a four-female group, living in Sana'a, Yemen. They asked for a loan of 200,000 YER from AMB.

Fatima is a 55-year-old widow with four children living with her in a small and old house in Sana'a. She is the leader of the group. She depends entirely on the retirement pension of her husband who has passed away. The house where she lives is very old and vulnerable and may fall down at any time, so Fatima wants to make a quick renovation of it. It is known that such a renovation needs a lot of money, and she doesn't have enough money for that; therefore, she decided to apply for a loan of 50,000 YER from AMB in order to purchase building materials such as cement and bricks. She looks forward to finishing renovation of the house in a very short time because it is in a very miserable condition. Fatima is very grateful to everyone who helps her in renovating her old house.

loans.use: to buy building materials such as cement and bricks for house renovation

loans.name: Jose Dionisio

texts.es: Jose Dionisio mayor de edad padre soltero de dos hijos menores de edad, aun bajo su responsabilidad, originario de uno de los municipios del Norte de Chinandega ubicado en el occidente del País, zona que se caracteriza por ser muy productiva y comercial donde predomina, la venta de oro, ganado, cerdos, entre otros, Jose Dionisio es un hombre trabajador, responsable y con muchos deseos de superación laboral y personal, es un microempresario propietario de un taller de reparación y mantenimiento de llantas de vehículos y la venta de neumáticos, Inicia  su negocio con esfuerzos propios el cual adquiere experiencia trabajando en un taller mecánico debido a que no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar una carrera profesional debido a los escasos recursos económicos que tenían en su hogar a Jose le hubiera gustado ser mecánico automotriz de profesión,actualmente tiene ya 25 años de tener este negocio el cual ha id creciendo poco a poco, sus compras las realiza al contado en otros municipio, uno de sus sueños es poder construir un poso para tener acceso al agua potable para montar el servicio de lavado de vehículos, motos, triciclos entre otros. el objetivo de este crédito es para capital de trabajo en la compra de neumáticos y materia prima para el servicio de reparación
texts.en: Jose Dionisio is an elderly single father with two young children that he still supports.  He is from a northern Chinandega town located in the western part of the country, an area known for being very productive and commercial, dominated by sales of gold, livestock, pigs and other things.  Jose Dionisio is a hardworking, responsible man with many desires to get ahead personally and professionally.  He is a small businessman with a vehicle and tire repair shop.  He gained experience by working in a mechanic shop because he didn’t have the opportunity to study for a professional career due to scarce financial resources in his home.  Jose would have liked to become a professional mechanic.  He has had this business for 25 years and he’s been growing it little by little.  He makes his purchases in cash in other cities.  One of his dreams is to have access to potable water so he can start a business washing cars, motorcycles, tricycles, etc.  He will use the money from this loanto buy tires and repair supplies.

loans.use: to buy tires.

loans.name: Isolda Adilia

texts.es: Isolda, es una joven muy activa y emprendedora con su negocio de venta de sopa, que realiza todos los días en su casa de habitación, es madre de dos hijos a quienes tiene estudiando. Isolda solicita el crédito para continuar invirtiendo en su negocio, comprara carne, pollo, hueso, verduras, arroz y gaseosas para realizar sopas y vender, así apoyar a su esposo compartiendo los gastos tanto del hogar como de los niños.
texts.en:
Isolda is a very active and enterprising young woman who has a business selling soup.  She works every day in her home.  She's the mother of two children who are in school.

Isolda's requesting the loan to continue investing in her business.  She'll buy meat, chicken, bones, vegetables, rice, and soda to make soup to sell.  That way she'll help her husband by sharing the expenses for both the household and the children.

loans.use: to buy meat, chicken, bones, vegetables, rice, and soda

loans.name: Ebonie

texts.en:
Ebonie is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a business buying and selling charcoal in the Philippines.

She is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to buy additional sacks of charcoal to sell for her business buying and selling charcoal.

Ebonie has been in this business for five years. She earns more income from food vending.

She has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy additional sacks of charcoal to sell

loans.name: Yolanda

texts.en:
Yolanda is 64 years old and widowed with seven children.

She earns a living by farming rice in the Philippines. Yolanda is borrowing PHP 17,000 through NWTF to buy fertilizer and other farm supplies.

Yolanda has been farming rice for three years and also earns additional income from farming vegetables.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream of saving enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and other farm supplies

loans.name: Erminda

texts.en:
Erminda is 53 years old and married with four children.

She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 30,000 loan through NWTF to purchase stock to sell like soap, chips, bread, eggs, etc.

Erminda has borrowed and paid back 23 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 20 years and also earns an income from motorcycle transport.

She aspires to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase stock to sell like soap, chips, bread, eggs, etc

loans.name: Juanita

texts.en:
Juanita works hard to support her family. She is married and has a business buying and selling fish in the Philippines.

She requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional boxes of fish to sell.

Juanita has been in this business for two years now.

In the future, Juanita would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional boxes of fish to sell
